name: VIDEO_SOURCE_AUDIO_PUBLISH_STATE_CHANGED
description: Occurs when the audio publishing state changes.The callback for the second instance.

parameters.oldState: For the previous publishing state, see STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE.

parameters.newState: For the current publishing state, see STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE.

parameters.elapseSinceLastState: The time elapsed (ms) from the previous state to the current state.
